leadJourneyCache	CREATE TABLE `leadJourneyCache` (
  `id` int(11) NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT,
  `email` varchar(320) COLLATE utf8mb4_unicode_ci NOT NULL,
  `mauticData` text COLLATE utf8mb4_unicode_ci DEFAULT NULL,
  `pipedriveData` text COLLATE utf8mb4_unicode_ci DEFAULT NULL,
  `aiAnalysis` text COLLATE utf8mb4_unicode_ci DEFAULT NULL,
  `cachedAt` timestamp NOT NULL DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP,
  `expiresAt` timestamp NOT NULL,
  PRIMARY KEY (`id`) /*T![clustered_index] CLUSTERED */,
  UNIQUE KEY `leadJourneyCache_email_unique` (`email`)
) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8mb4 COLLATE=utf8mb4_unicode_ci
